name: Blob Hoard
description:
Your blobs will follow and protect you! Lead them through the maze to exterminate all corrupted RED blobs to free your fellow PINK blobs!

THROW your blobs over obstacles to attack baddies!

GATHER them again to regroup into one big happy family!

WSAD - Move | Shift - Dash

Right Click - Throw Blobs

Space - Gather Blobs

Alt  - secret :)
